meanings.sent1: She is the adeptest student in the class.
meanings.sent2: He is the adeptest player on the team.
meanings.sent3: Being the adeptest at puzzles, she always finishes first.
meanings.sent4: Her skills were so adeptest, they seemed almost magical.
meanings.sent5: The adeptest chef in town can make any dish perfectly.

meanings.sent1: The adeptest dancer wowed the audience with her performance.
meanings.sent2: He proved to be the adeptest negotiator in the company.
meanings.sent3: The adeptest juggler in the circus never dropped a ball.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the adeptest instrument in the choir.
meanings.sent5: The adeptest mechanic fixed the car in record time.
